Texts.Eng: I don't mean to interrupt your training regimen, but I have noticed the weapons you employ could be made more versatile. I have calculated that reverse engineering illegal weapons may yield much needed results. Thus, you should go fight Bandits and Space-Faring Robots for these parts.^white;
Texts.value: 我并不想打断你的训练计划,但我注意到你需要一把多用途武器。我已经计算过，对那些非法武器进行逆向工程可能会分析出我们需要的数据。因此，你应该去打击星际海盗和太空机器人。^white;

Texts.Chs: 这些非法的枪支零件可以用来制造令人印象深刻的枪支。 不过，你需要制作一个特定的扳机，但我已经为你做好了一个。去找一处铁砧去锻造你的反抗者和第二个扳机！
Texts.Eng: These illegal gun parts can be used to make an impressive gun. You'll need to create a specific mechanism, though, but I've already created one for you. Go build the Versa in an anvil once you make the second mechanism!
